00011 #include "memory.h"
00012 #include "stack.h"

00014 // ----- stack_create -----------------------------------------------
00018 SStack * stack_create(int iMaxDepth)
00019 {
00020   SStack * pStack= (SStack *) memalloc(sizeof(SStack)+
00021                                       iMaxDepth*sizeof(void *));
00022   pStack->iMaxDepth= iMaxDepth;
00023   pStack->iDepth= 0;
00024   return pStack;
00025 }
00026 
00027 // ----- stack_destroy ----------------------------------------------
00031 void stack_destroy(SStack ** ppStack)
00032 {
00033   if (*ppStack != NULL) {
00034     memfree(*ppStack);
00035     *ppStack= NULL;
00036   }
00037 }
00038 
00039 // ----- stack_push -------------------------------------------------
00043 int stack_push(SStack * pStack, void * pItem)
00044 {
00045   if (pStack->iDepth < pStack->iMaxDepth) {
00046     pStack->apItems[pStack->iDepth]= pItem;
00047     pStack->iDepth++;
00048     return 1;
00049   }
00050   return 0;
00051 }
00052 
00053 // ----- stack_pop --------------------------------------------------
00057 void * stack_pop(SStack * pStack)
00058 {
00059   if (pStack->iDepth > 0) {
00060     pStack->iDepth--;
00061     return pStack->apItems[pStack->iDepth];
00062   }
00063   return NULL;
00064 }
00065 
00066 // ----- stack_top --------------------------------------------------
00070 void * stack_top(SStack * pStack)
00071 {
00072   if (pStack->iDepth > 0)
00073     return pStack->apItems[pStack->iDepth-1];
00074   return NULL;
00075 }
00076 
00077 // ----- stack_get_at -----------------------------------------------
00081 void * stack_get_at(SStack * pStack, unsigned int iIndex)
00082 {
00083   if (iIndex < pStack->iDepth)
00084     return pStack->apItems[iIndex];
00085   return NULL;
00086 }
00087 
00088 // ----- stack_depth ------------------------------------------------
00092 int stack_depth(SStack * pStack)
00093 {
00094   return pStack->iDepth;
00095 }
00096 
00097 // ----- stack_is_empty ---------------------------------------------
00101 int stack_is_empty(SStack * pStack)
00102 {
00103   if (pStack->iDepth > 0)
00104     return 0;
00105   return 1;
00106 }
00107 
00108 // ----- stack_copy -------------------------------------------------
00112 SStack * stack_copy(SStack * pStack)
00113 {
00114   SStack * pNewStack;
00115   int iIndex;
00116 
00117   pNewStack= stack_create(pStack->iMaxDepth);
00118   pNewStack->iDepth= pStack->iDepth;
00119   for (iIndex= 0; iIndex < pNewStack->iDepth; iIndex++)
00120     pNewStack->apItems[iIndex]= pStack->apItems[iIndex];
00121   return pNewStack;
00122 }
00123 
00124 // ----- stack_equal ------------------------------------------------
00128 int stack_equal(SStack * pStack1, SStack * pStack2)
00129 {
00130   int iIndex;
00131 
00132   if (pStack1->iDepth != pStack2->iDepth)
00133     return 0;
00134   for (iIndex= 0; iIndex < pStack1->iDepth; iIndex++)
00135     if (pStack1->apItems[iIndex] != pStack2->apItems[iIndex])
00136       return 0;
00137   return 1;
00138 }
